formatted_address: Sime Rd, #20 PCN - Lornie Nature Corridor, Singapore 288305
name: 昭南神社歷史紀念碑

reviews.text:
Syonan Jinja Historic Marker marks a historic event of the construction of a Japanese Shinto Shrine 昭南神社 by the British and Australian Prisoners of War at the MacRitchie Reservoir site during the Japanese Occupation of Singapore.
The location of the Marker is not the actual location of the shrine per se but rather on an approprate location to showcase a significant piece of history around the area.
The place the marker is placed isn't related to the landmark as it is within the grounds of Macritchie Reservoir. Guess it wasn't meant for people to find out.

vicinity: Sime Road, #20 PCN - Lornie Nature Corridor
